name: 張正春
objective:
機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。

Sample space; combinatorial analysis; expected value; joint distributed random variables; MGF and characteristic functions; Central limited theory; Random walk and poison random process.
